ygData.subject: Eldritch Collective Initiate Bracer Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, I just finished getting all my stuff and combining them in the sewing kit Xalirilan Zarinokosalio gave me and now I have a block that says it the
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,
I just finished getting all my stuff and combining them in the sewing
kit Xalirilan Zarinokosalio gave me and now I have a block that says it
the material for the bracer, What do i do with it now?

Also I've lost Xalirilan Zarinokosalio's location. Does anyone know
where she is?

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
